BooksBrowsePage.title: Book Shelf
BooksBrowsePage.description: Browse through our extensive collection of books available in the library. View detailed information on each book and request to borrow them easily.

BooksPage.title: Book Management
BooksPage.description: Manage the library collection with ease. Search through all available books, edit or delete existing entries, and add new books to keep the collection up to date.

MembersPage.title: Member Management
MembersPage.description: Oversee the library membership efficiently. Search through all registered members, update or remove their information, and add new members to ensure accurate records.

TransactionsPage.title: My Requests And Transactions
TransactionsPage.description: See all your pending book requests in one place. Cancel requests that are not approved yet. Easily filter by current status of your request to find what you are looking for.

AllTransactionsPage.title: Transaction Management
AllTransactionsPage.description: Manage all user requests for borrowing books in one place. Review, approve, or reject borrowing requests and confirm book returns to ensure efficient library management.
